title: misc/vim: Godoc command cannot find documentation for import paths containing a period
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.
1. :Godoc code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/types

What is the expected output?
A window with the documentation for the types package

What do you see instead?
No documentation found for "code".
No documentation found for "code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/types".

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
1.1

Please provide any additional information below.

It seems plugin/godoc.vim assumes that anything after the first period is an identifier
to be looked up in the package which is assumed to be the component before the first
period.
